column4: Anyone here use Wengo Phone? I think Wengo are a bunch of conartist mofo's taking the OpenSource community for a BIG ride.
lol yea i started about that same time for about the same reason ;)

yep. it was all fun.. but this was back in the day when Slackware was the distro of choice.. and anything you did was .. download and compile from source... then spend weeks trying to figure out why stuff didnt work and waht dependancies were missing
